level_1.skillDescription:
An all-directional shockwave attack centered around yourself
Enemies that are hit will be provoked

level_2.skillDescription:
Adds the ability to charge to 2nd stage
Charging to higher stages increases skill power

level_3.skillDescription: When charged to the max, enemies that are hit will be drawn in towards you

abilities.skillDescription: Reduces the time required to reach max charge
